name: HTMLLinkElement
description: The HTMLLinkElement interface represents reference information for external resources and the relationship of those resources to a document and vice-versa (corresponds to link element; not to be confused with a, which is represented by HTMLAnchorElement). This object inherits all of the properties and methods of the HTMLElement interface.
